operations with cntr collections
[contour for interpolation (cntr)]


Functions

bool surfit::cntrs_delall ()
 removes all contours from surfit_cntrs collection
bool surfit::cntrs_del (int pos)
 removes contour from surfit_cntrs collection at 'pos' position
bool surfit::cntrs_read (const char *filename, const char *cntrname, int columns=3, int col1=1, int col2=2, int col3=3, const char *delimiter=" ", int grow_by=250)
 reads contour from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_cntr collection
bool surfit::cntrs_load (const char *filename, const char *cntrname=NULL)
 reads contour from datafile (binary format) and adds it to surfit_cntrs collection
cntr * surfit::cntrs_at (int pos)
 returns pointer to contour at 'pos' position in surfit_cntrs collection
cntr * surfit::cntrs_first ()
 returns pointer to first contour in surfit_cntrs collection
cntr * surfit::cntrs_last ()
 returns pointer to last contour in surfit_cntrs collection
int surfit::cntrs_size ()
 returns amount of elements in surfit_cntrs collection
int surfit::cntrs_info ()
 prints information about all contours in surfit_cntrs collection
bool surfit::cntrs_to_wcntrs (REAL weight)
 converts all contours from surfit_cntrs to contours with specified informational weight and places them to surfit_wcntrs
